## Directory of Antique & Collector Vehicle Appraisers in London, Ontario  

London offers specialized appraisal services focused primarily on collector vehicles through established local experts with decades of experience. Below is a detailed directory:

---

### 1\. **Paul Prince – Collector Vehicle Appraisals**  
- **Specialty**: Vintage/classic cars, motorcycles, automotive memorabilia  
- **Years Active**: Over 20 years  
- **Certifications**: Accredited by Canadian classic car associations  
- **Contact**: 519-666-1114 | paul@prince-cva.ca  
- **Service Area**: Southwestern Ontario  

---

### 2\. **Prowse Appraisal Services**  
- **(Jim Prowse)**  
- **Specialty**: Antique automobiles (pre-WWII models), restoration valuation  
- **Years Active**: Since 1995  
- **Contact**: 519-434-3579 | jim_prowse_34ford@rogers.com  

---

### 3\. *Classic and Rod* **(Tom Muth)**    
+ *Partners with Toronto-based operations*    
+ Specialty: Custom hot rods/restored classics post-WWII era    
+ Contact: Tommuth@hotmail.com | www.classicandrod.com | Mobile:647‑519‑6946    

---

#### Service Areas & Pricing   
All three serve Greater London region (*extending to Toronto/Windsor corridors*). Typical pricing ranges from $150–$400 per appraisal depending on complexity[*]. Most offer remote photo valuations at lower rates (~$75–$150).  

--- 

#### Key Notes:
The above specialists focus exclusively on automotive assets—no dedicated fine art/furniture appraisers were identified locally[*]. For broader antiques:
   - Prestige Estate Services ([source](https://prestigeestateservices.com)) offers remote valuations nationwide starting at $100/hr.
   - OrientalAntiques.co.uk provides free online Asian art estimates globally[[7]].  

ℹ️ Confirm business hours/appointment availability directly via listed contacts[*].
